original_title: The Unicorn in Snow Pants Suddenly Ran Off
overview: “The Unicorn in Snow Pants Suddenly Ran Off” explores the clash between blind children's play worlds and the reality they live in. The film introduces us to three confident children, for whom blindness is not a disability but rather a different kind of normal. Unicorns, call centers and flying grandfathers each play a role.
title: The Unicorn in Snow Pants Suddenly Ran Off
